page.title: 06My Day By Helen Buttle
page.content: My name is Helen.I live in Martinstown in Manor Grove.I have got a brother and a mummy and daddy.My house is made of bricks and it has four bedrooms a kitchen and a lounge and a dining room.The lounge and dining room are together. First I got up from my bed and got dressed in my school uniform.My school uniform is a grey pinifore with a white blouse with a grey and red tie. Then I had a breakfast of cornflakes. When I had finished breakfast I had a wash.After my wash I went to the bus stop.The bus came at 8.15 and I got on.In the bus we came through Winter bourne steepleton and then Winterbourne Abbas.When I got to school I played with my friends.Then it was time to go in.When I got in my class I got out my dictionary work. {continued....}
